claim: Exactly one post authored by an elder user has a score greater than 19.
extra_info: elder users refers to Age > 65; Score of over 19 refers to Score > = 20
reasoning: The query joining posts with users where Age > 65 and Score >= 20 returns exactly 1 row, which matches the claim that exactly one post authored by an elder user has a score greater than 19.

content.thinking: Let me verify this claim by exploring the database schema and then querying for posts authored by elder users (Age > 65) with a score >= 20.

content.content:
badges       postHistory  posts        users      
comments     postLinks    tags         votes

tool_use_result.stdout:
badges       postHistory  posts        users      
comments     postLinks    tags         votes

content.content:
CREATE TABLE users
(
    Id              INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    Reputation      INTEGER          null,
    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    DisplayName     TEXT null,
    LastAccessDate  DATETIME     null,
    WebsiteUrl      TEXT null,
    Location        TEXT null,
    AboutMe         TEXT     null,
    Views           INTEGER          null,
    UpVotes         INTEGER          null,
    DownVotes       INTEGER          null,
    AccountId       INTEGER          null,
    Age             INTEGER          null,
    ProfileImageUrl TEXT null
);
CREATE TABLE posts
(
    Id                    INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    PostTypeId            INTEGER          null,
    AcceptedAnswerId      INTEGER          null,
    CreaionDate           DATETIME     null,
    Score                 INTEGER          null,
    ViewCount             INTEGER          null,
    Body                  TEXT     null,
    OwnerUserId           INTEGER          null,
    LasActivityDate       DATETIME     null,
    Title                 TEXT null,
    Tags                  TEXT null,
    AnswerCount           INTEGER          null,
    CommentCount          INTEGER          null,
    FavoriteCount         INTEGER          null,
    LastEditorUserId      INTEGER          null,
    LastEditDate          DATETIME     null,
    CommunityOwnedDate    DATETIME    null,
    ParentId              INTEGER          null,
    ClosedDate            DATETIME     null,
    OwnerDisplayName      TEXT null,
    LastEditorDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (LastEditorUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (OwnerUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (ParentId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/codebase_community.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.OwnerUserId = u.Id WHERE u.Age > 65 AND p.Score >= 20;"

content.text:
The query confirms that exactly 1 post authored by an elder user (Age > 65) has a score >= 20.
